description: This cheesy gnocchi dish is super quick and easy to put together, perfect for midweek meals.
name: Chicken, Tomato & Mozzarella Gnocchi Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Fill a large pot with water and bring to the boil. Add the gnocchi and cook according to pack instructions. Drain and set aside.

Heat the oil in a large pan on high heat, add the chicken breasts and cook for 2-3 minutes on each side. Reduce the heat to medium and add the onion, garlic and zucchini and cook for 4-5 minutes to soften, stirring occasionally.

Pre-heat the grill to the highest setting. Pour the can of tomatoes into the pan, add a splash of water to the can and pour over the chicken and vegetables. Cook for 5 minutes until the sauce has reduced slightly.
Place the chicken and vegetables in to an ovenproof dish and scatter torn mozzarella on top. Grill for 2-3 minutes until the cheese is melted and bubbling and serve.
